Html: After reading http://blogs.msdn.com/jaimer/archive/2008/11/16/microsoft-client-continuum-in-action-the-silverlight-toolkit-charts-running-in-wpf.aspx article I tried to use this solution  but it was made for November Silverlight toolkit release. I tried to port December silverlight toolkit for WPF but when I updated all needed files (for my opinion) chart was not showed. No errors ae displayed, only empty chart without title and line series. Does anybode know what the cause is?

Hi!

Sorry, but it seems to me that you are asking wrong people. Our project has no relationship to Silverlight Toolkit Charts.
If I am wrong, and I've understood you question wrongly, correct me, please.

Mikhail.
